mentionedBy.name: Informatica
mentionedBy.notes: One of Informatica's longest-standing competitors with broad suite for data integration, transformation, quality, and governance. Strong in enterprise integration space with both on-premises and cloud capabilities.

mentionedBy.name: Informatica
mentionedBy.notes: Qlik officially discontinued Talend Open Studio on January 31, 2024. Qlik Talend Cloud is now core subscription-based data integration platform for cloud and hybrid environments with automated data workflows. Part of top 5 iPaaS market leaders.

mentionedBy.name: Informatica
mentionedBy.notes: Leading alternative with comprehensive suite for data integration, transformation, quality, and governance. Now operates under Qlik's data integration and analytics ecosystem, combining ETL with data quality, governance, and observability features. Strong focus on AI-powered capabilities.

2020.note: One of Informatica's longest-standing competitors with broad suite for data integration, transformation, quality, and governance. Strong in enterprise integration space with both on-premises and cloud capabilities.

2024.note: Qlik officially discontinued Talend Open Studio on January 31, 2024. Qlik Talend Cloud is now core subscription-based data integration platform for cloud and hybrid environments with automated data workflows. Part of top 5 iPaaS market leaders.

2025.note: Leading alternative with comprehensive suite for data integration, transformation, quality, and governance. Now operates under Qlik's data integration and analytics ecosystem, combining ETL with data quality, governance, and observability features. Strong focus on AI-powered capabilities.
